project_plan.name: Weather Information Fetcher in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that interfaces with a public API to fetch and display current weather information for a specified city, including temperature, humidity, and weather conditions.

task.name: Set up the project environment and install necessary libraries
Implement function to fetch weather data from the public API
Implement function to parse and extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions from the fetched data
Implement function to display the extracted weather information in the terminal
Write tests for each of the implemented functions above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure they function correctly
